page.title: 07A Glenrothes Family
page.content: My name is Gillian Mackie.We are a family of four.My mum,dad,brother Colin and me.During the week my mum and dad go out to work.My mum works in Pico Electronics she is a buyer.This means she orders stocks for the company.My dad is the the manager of the E-Beam which is a machine that has something to do with microchips.I'm not really very sure what he does exactly.He works in a factory called Comphugraphics.While my mum and dad are at work Colin and I go to school.Iam in primary seven and Colin is in primary four.Sometimes on a Saturday or Sunday we go to visit our grannies.One of my grans lives in Kilrenny.My grandad is dead.My other granny lives with grandad in St Andrews.He has a dog called Bracken.He is getting old.I have lots of cousins. Most of them live here in Fife.
